Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.motion

Interface MotionApplier

All Superinterfaces:
DirectionProvider, LocationUpdater, MotionModifier, SpeedProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMotionApplier
public interface MotionApplier
extends MotionModifier, LocationUpdater
Base interface of all Objects that apply a motion to a subclass of YaegerEntity.

    Coordinate2D get()
    Return the current transformation.

  • Method Details

    • get

      Coordinate2D get()
      Return the current transformation.
      Returns:
      A Coordinate2D representing the transformation applied on LocationUpdater.updateLocation(Point2D)

    • getPreviousLocation

      java.util.Optional<Coordinate2D> getPreviousLocation()
      Return the previous location. This Object is exposed to resolve an issue with the fact that collision detection occurs after all Entities are updated. If an Entity sets its speed to 0 on collision detection, it still received its last motion.

      Because of that it is impossible that halt an Entities movement if the user continues to press the movement buttons or another system is continuing to set the speed to a positive value.

      Returns:
      An Optional containing the Coordinate2D representing the previous location of the Entity.
